item.description:
Celebrate the holiday season, break out your most fabulous holiday themed shoes (if you like) and join the Hello Stiletto Shoe Club and Project Smile for Santa and Stilettos- an evening of holiday fun to benefit Project Smile.

Guests will enjoy complimentary appetizers, specialty cocktails, DJ, holiday ornament swap, silent auction and of course Hello Stiletto's famous pink carpet shoe parade and competition.

Jessica Lynn, fashionista and owner of South End boutique Leokadia will be a guest judge and will be donating a special prize for the winner of the Best in Shoe competition.

Straight from the North Pole and honorary shoe judge, don't miss a visit from beloved Santa. Some very handsome elves will be joining Santa to help find out who has been naughty or nice this year!

Please bring a holiday ornament with you as we will be doing an ornament swap!

Don't miss the terrific silent auction with sports memorabilia, golf outings, jewelry, theater tickets, gift baskets and more! A great opportunity to get some wonderful gifts for your loved ones.

Tickets are a $10 and include a Project Smile 2010 calendar and entry into a prize drawing. All proceeds benefit Project Smile. Project Smile is a non profit organization dedicated to helping children who are victims of traumatic events. For more info, please visit www.projectsmile.org

Guys- you can leave the stilettos at home, but come join us anyways for a fun night and mingling with some very awesome ladies.

If you can't arrive at 6pm, feel free to join us later!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside Felt. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Santa and Stilettos: An Evening of Holiday Fun to Benefit Project Smile
